CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How Did You Hear About Us?
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what our users have to say about our Ethereum transaction monitoring app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for tracking new Ethereum transactions in real-time. The notifications are lightning fast and super reliable.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As an Ethereum developer, this app has become an essential tool in my workflow. It helps me stay on top of new contract deployments and transactions.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The customizable filters and seamless integration with my trading bot have significantly improved my alpha. Highly recommended for crypto traders!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the game with our cutting-edge technology that continuously scans the Ethereum blockchain for new transactions as they occur.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Never miss a beat! Our app sends instant alerts the moment a new transaction is detected, ensuring you're always informed and ready to act.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Gain deep insights into every transaction with our extensive data coverage, including sender, recipient, amount, gas fees, and more.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Tailor the app to your specific needs by setting custom filters based on addresses, token types, transaction values, and other parameters.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Leverage our powerful analytics tools to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies in transaction data, enabling informed decision-making.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Effortlessly incorporate our app into your existing workflows and systems through our robust API and seamless integration capabilities.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Tracker
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app find new Ethereum transactions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app constantly monitors the Ethereum blockchain and indexes all new transactions as they are added to the ledger. We use advanced algorithms to quickly detect and process these transactions.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How quickly are new transactions displayed?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: New Ethereum transactions are typically displayed in our app within seconds after they have been added to the blockchain. Our system is highly optimized for real-time tracking.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I filter or search transactions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, you can filter transactions by address, value, gas price and many other parameters. Our search functionality allows you to quickly find specific transactions of interest.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a fee to use the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Our basic Ethereum transaction tracking is completely free to use. We do offer premium paid plans with additional features and data export options.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our Ethereum transaction monitoring app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app allows you to monitor the Ethereum blockchain in real-time for new transactions. It provides alerts and analytics on incoming transactions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app connects directly to Ethereum nodes and listens for new blocks and transactions as they get mined. We parse and analyze this data to deliver insights to you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What kind of alerts does it provide?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can set custom alerts for transactions matching certain criteria like sender, receiver, value transferred, and more. Alerts can be received via email, SMS, webhook etc.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, we do not require any private keys or wallet access. All monitoring is done completely via public nodes on the Ethereum network which is open source.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We have a free tier to get started. Paid tiers start at $49/month for more advanced monitoring, analytics and higher usage limits.
